title: Possible account bug
body:
I know that we can earn four chests each month and i know all that rules to earn one, but for more than a month, i have not chests available (i see that in the profile). I got S ranks and i dont recive chests. I think that my account could have a bug, so if you could help, I would appreciate.
Thanks.

replies.body:
There are a number of reasons why you may not be receiving chests that our [Hextech Crafting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) goes over.

If you'd like us to look into this further, I recommend you [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with our specialists since there's a fair bit of research that will be required.
